overview:
James is the founder and managing director of Gravy Travel Technology, a business providing software as a service solutions to the online travel sector.

Having started his career in corporate finance with KPMG, James worked in marketing and product management roles for HSBC and L’Oreal before moving into the travel arena as sales & marketing director with Topdeck Travel.

Following a year with the online luxury tour operator Black Tomato, James moved to Villarenters.com the DMGT plc owned villa rental business where he spent 2 years as general manager.

In July 2011 James left the business to create Gravy Travel Technology.
